title: LMPSeizNet: A Lightweight Multiscale Pyramid Convolutional Neural Network for Epileptic Seizure Detection on EEG Brain Signals
details: A Alsaadan, M Alzamel, M Hussain - Mathematics, 2024
abstract: Epilepsy is a chronic disease and one of the most common neurological disorders worldwide. Electroencephalogram (EEG) signals are widely used to detect epileptic seizures, which provide specialists with essential information about the brain's …
